name: Cars Wrecked Mobile
description:
Cars Wrecked MOBILE Use a giant wrecking ball to ram cars off the highway!

Made for the GMTK Game Jam 2021 

DESKTOP VERSION!

Controls:

Tap left side of screen to go left

Tap right side of screen to go right

Credits:

Explosion borrowed from MattWalkden's Lunar Battle Pack:  https://mattwalkden.itch.io/lunar-battle-pack

Music by my friend, Daniel.
